author: Stan Schroeder
title: Facebook commits $100 million to journalism amid the coronavirus outbreak
description: Facebook has pledged $100 million to support the news industry during the coronavirus crisis, the company announced Monday. The company will grant $25 million to local news funding through its Facebook Journalism Project, as well as $75 million in additional …
content:
Facebook has pledged $100 million to support the news industry during the coronavirus crisis, the company announced Monday. 
The company will grant $25 million to local news funding through its Facebook Journalism Project, as well as $75 million in additiona… [+1668 chars]
